column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Deborah - Thank you for the 5-star review. I'm glad we can call you one of our "regulars
column2: and I'm even happier that you've tried several of our ramens and landed on a favorite in our Sprouting Up Ramen. Moreover, I appreciate your understanding of the line that develops during peak hours. We hope to serve you again soon!
